name: Emergency Operator: Savannah Demo
description:
A proof of concept prototype for a game idea called Emergency Operator. 

This demo plays out the scenario of a caller whose Dad has stopped breathing. This demo is best played with audio.

With Emergency Operator, I'm most interested in capturing the genuine, emotional and human stories that are at the core of so many emergency calls. Stories that can be utterly gut-wrenching or panic ridden and yet operators keep calm and professional, all for the sake of helping the person on the other end of the line.

I'm hoping to test out the core experience of being on the receiving end of an emergency call and the search engine mechanic, where you need to listen closely for clues on what questions to ask the caller to best assist them.

If you like what you played or have any feedback at all, please reach out! You can find me on:

Twitter: @_zhimingchen

Thanks for playing!
